A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney continues to ruin Star Wars. This was the most anticipated film of the new series for me because of the return of Luke Skywalker. The story paints the Jedi master as a failure and intimately kills him off like they did with Han Solo. There's no good storyline and the movie doesn't seem to have any focus with all the jumping around.  Smoke was a huge disappointment in that Ren killed him so easily (no master smith would go down so easily). Overall a pretty big disappointment.
